question: Some people believe that young people bring more profit to the company. Others says that older people actually bring more profits. Discuss both views and give your opinion.
text: Today's business world consist a lot of competitions for emerging in the race of earning higher profits. Some people argue that younger employees facilitate the company's management to earn more income instead of old age employees. I completely agree with this statement because I think that the new generation is more creative and innovative as compare to old one's. This essay shall intend to delve both views in the upcoming paragraphs.

At the outset, nowadays most of the organizations prefer to recruit young people since they have up to date knowledge as well as they are more creative and innovative. Undoubtedly, at present those companies adopt the new technology in their products have achieved the highest rate of success in the target market. For example, most of the young generation have sound knowledge related to their field and they performed 2ell with more creation to complete their targets. Moreover, at present many young people  do hard work with overtime to earn better income because their productivity is more than old age employees.

On the contrary, some other people argue that old age employees are better to earn high yield for the association. This is because, that think that senior workers have more experience of work as they attached to club for a long duration. Step by step they reached at top level positions together with, they become an effective leader with sound qualities about how to run a team? They fulfilled the company's targets from their team members. Thus, they increase the level of annual profits after completion of whole objectives.

To sum up, although, in every community there are old age employees as well as young workers working efficiently still youngsters proved themselves in the aspect of more productivity as their minds are most sufficient to solve any difficult task.
